snippet: Top-seeded Serena Williams has withdrawn from the Western & Southern Open with a shoulder injury, the tournament announced on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Serena Williams has withdrawn from the Western & Southern Open with a shoulder injury, the tournament announced on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Shoulder Injury Forces Serena Williams Out of Tourney
headline.main: Shoulder Injury Forces Serena Williams Out of Tourney
